00010         {

00012                 {
00013                         // Call parent's init method
00014                         parent::init();

00017                 public function index()
00018                 {
00019                         $this->common();
00020                 }

00022                 public function common()
00023                 {
00024                         global $css_files;
00025                         
00026                         $this->mimetype = 'text/css';
00027                         $this->response->body = '';
00028                         $mtime = 0;
00029                         foreach ($css_files as $css_file)
00030                         {
00031                                 $css_file = dirname(__FILE__) . '/../' . $css_file;
00032                                 $mtime = max($mtime, filemtime($css_file));
00033                                 $this->response->body .= file_get_contents($css_file);
00034                         }
00035                         $this->response->add_header('Content-Type', $this->mimetype);
00036                         $this->response->add_header('Cache-Control', 'max-age=86400');
00037                         $this->response->add_header('Pragma', 'max-age=86400');
00038                         $this->response->add_header('Last-Modified', gmstrftime('%a, %d %b %Y %H:%M:%S %Z', $mtime));
00039                         $this->response->add_header('Date', gmstrftime('%a, %d %b %Y %H:%M:%S %Z'));
00040                         $this->response->add_header('Expires', gmstrftime('%a, %d %b %Y %H:%M:%S %Z', time() + 86400));
00041 
00042                         $this->render(NULL);
00043                 }
00044         }
00045 ?>
